title: Emerald and Ruby Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Telugu Heritage Piece
features: Elaborate three-layered Haaram design featuring floral motifs and paisley patterns, encrusted with sparkling diamonds, rubies, and vibrant emeralds. The pendant showcases a large central emerald surrounded by diamonds and finished with a delicate pearl drop detail. The intricate openwork showcases superior craftsmanship.
colors: Lustrous White (Pearls). The classic color combination signifies prosperity and auspiciousness.
occasions: Ideal for traditional South Indian weddings (Vivahaalu)
and grand festive celebrations like Ugadi and Diwali. Also suitable for upscale events and formal gatherings.
description: A regal statement piece reflecting South Indian heritage. The combination of diamonds, rubies, and emeralds signifies love, prosperity, and wisdom. The meticulous craftsmanship ensures lasting beauty and enduring value. This is an heirloom piece to be cherished for generations.
